title: Stock-Out Date Predictor for Retail Inventory
description: A lightweight and scalable machine learning pipeline using LightGBM to predict stock-out dates for retail inventory.

title: Phantom Inventory Classifier
description: Multi-model ML solution for detecting phantom inventory in retail.

title: Water Allocation Optimization
description: Optimized water allocation in global supply chains using SAS Viya.

title: NCAA Bracket Prediction
description: NCAA bracket prediction model for CCAC 2025 using XGBoost and engineered geospatial features.
